ygData.subject: RE: [EQBards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm....  *turns red around the edges*  *smoke begins pouring out of ears* *flames shoot from eyes
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm.... *turns red around the edges* *smoke begins pouring out of ears*
*flames shoot from eyes
engulfin..................****************************************

Woo, barely doused the flames there. I am SO, very, very, very sick of
seeing patch messages that quietly proclaim that something is now in which
we have been assured 100 times is in on live servers. Absor and Abashi both
have continually maintained that the wizard teleports have been on the live
servers. To quote Absor, "the vendor is there and I am surprised you
haven't found it, it doesn't have to be blatantly obvious". When will they
ever get a clue that if 250,000+ people cannot find an item on a vendor it
is 99% likely to NOT be there? It would have taken someone at VI all of 5
minutes to log onto a live server, guide tp to the vendors loc and check
this out, yet it took two weeks of "it's in there" and two weeks of "you're
wrong Absor" to get it worked out.

Heck the port to the plane of mischief was probably only visible to gnome
clerics and paladins of Bristlebane before this.

an irate Kitasi

Very boring stuff this time. I guess good for Velious travel, but other
than that. Well, expect to suddenly see another glowing spinning ball
signifying the minor polishing of the Plane of Mischief (read, oh hell we
forgot to put the port in) "that's been there all along."

*Small Patch*

These include some minor
polishing on the Plane of Mischief, as well as the placement of the wizard's
Velious teleport spells on merchants.

Very soon, we'll be back to our continual plans to enhance the game world.
We'll be sure to let you know what we have planned as we can.

- The EverQuest Team
